Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/State
ShortDescription: Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Indiana, 76th, State and 75th : due to, street blockage near 75th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Indiana, 76th, State and 75th : due to, street blockage near 75th/State.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
